name: Lots of Tanks 2
description:
Lots of Tanks 2 contains improved versions of the seven levels from Lots of Tanks! If you haven't played the first game, play the old levels first.

Lots of Tanks 2 is a top-down shooter where you must destroy all the enemy tanks, trucks, lasers, miners, and even helicopters! It features 14 new levels with new tools and enemies! Good luck and have fun!

The game should take 1-2 hours to complete, but if you stop playing, you can use the Level Select screen to the right in the main menu.

On the web version, press Esc to go to the main menu.
